payload.name: sandboxing-with-deny-by-default-network-filesystem-scopes-bounds-damage
payload.title: Sandboxing with deny-by-default network/filesystem scopes bounds damage
payload.formal: confinement is a safety invariant; capability grants are exceptions.
payload.apm2_mapping: make sandboxing non-optional for executors. Policy is not enough; enforce at OS boundary (32). Capability grants should be narrow, time-bounded, and logged.
